timber.log

Class Timber

  • java.lang.Object
    • timber.log.Timber

  • public final class Timber
extends Object
    Logging for lazy people.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Timber.DebugTree
      A Tree for debug builds.
      static class  Timber.Tree
      A facade for handling logging calls.

      • asTree

        public static Timber.Tree asTree()
        A view into Timber's planted trees as a tree itself. This can be used for injecting a logger instance rather than using static methods or to facilitate testing.

      • tag

        public static Timber.Tree tag(String tag)
